rules.natural: Provided that the material is restricted, it is monitored.

Whenever the legislation has an investigation agency, if it is not the case that either the animal is protected or the habitat is protected for the animal, then a violation is not detected for the animal.
The legislation has an investigation agency, or it has an enforcement agency.

If compliance is required by the legislation, then whenever the legislation has an enforcement agency, provided that it is not the case that the animal is protected or the habitat is protected for the animal, a violation is not detected for the animal.
Whenever the legislation includes a civil penalty, compliance is required by the legislation.
Either the legislation includes a civil penalty, or it includes a criminal penalty.
Whenever a special permit is issued under the legislation, conditional approval is given under the legislation.
If the animal is endangered, then the animal is protected.
Either the animal is endangered, or the financial product is regulated.
Under the condition that a temporary waiver is provided under the legislation, an exemption is granted under the legislation.
If conditional approval is given under the legislation, a temporary waiver is provided under the legislation.
Under the condition that the legislation has a primary reviewer, it has a final approver.
The legislation has a primary reviewer, or it has a secondary reviewer.

Provided that the legislation has a secondary reviewer, if it is not the case that whenever the legislation has a review process, if it is not the case that an impact assessment for the event implies the assessment is completed then the assessment is not reviewed, then the process under the legislation is completed.

If the legislation has a final approver, then under the condition that it is not the case that whenever the legislation has a review process, if it is not the case that an impact assessment for the event implies the assessment is completed then the assessment is not reviewed, the process under the legislation is completed.
Whenever the financial product is regulated, it is taxable.
Provided that recycling is mandated by the legislation, if the material is non-recyclable, then it is not the case that the material is recyclable.
If voluntary recycling is allowed under the legislation, a recycling incentive is offered under the legislation.
Whenever a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, if the material is hazardous, then the material is restricted.

Under the condition that the legislation involves a state regulator, if it is not the case that a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, then a disposal exception is allowed under the legislation.

Provided that the legislation involves a federal regulator, if it is not the case that a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, then a disposal exception is allowed under the legislation.
Whenever a national standard is established by the legislation, a local exemption is not permitted under the legislation.
Under the condition that a primary standard is set by the legislation, a uniform policy is adopted under the legislation.

Provided that a secondary standard is set by the legislation, if it is not the case that the legislation involves a state regulator or a federal regulator, then a national standard is established by the legislation.
If a base requirement is specified by the legislation, a primary standard is set by the legislation.
Either a base requirement is specified by the legislation, or a supplemental requirement is specified by the legislation.
Under the condition that a supplemental requirement is specified by the legislation, a secondary standard is set by the legislation.
The material undergoes chemical treatment, or it undergoes physical treatment.
Provided that the material undergoes physical treatment, it is not the case that the material is hazardous.
If treatment is required for the material, it is not the case that the material is exempt from treatment.
Either the event is major, or if the financial product is taxable, then the habitat is protected for the animal.

Provided that a compliance audit is conducted under the legislation, if it is not the case that whenever a treatment protocol is defined by the legislation, if it is not the case that chemical treatment implies the material is not hazardous then treatment is required, then a protocol violation occurs under the legislation.

If it is not the case that a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, it is not the case that a disposal exception is allowed under the legislation.

(¬(A22 → A23) → A24).natural: Whenever it is not the case that an impact assessment for the event implies the assessment is completed, the assessment for the event is reviewed.

(¬(A25 → (¬(A22 → A23) → ¬A24)) → A26).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the legislation has a review process, if it is not the case that an impact assessment for the event implies the assessment is completed then the assessment is not reviewed, then the process under the legislation is completed.

(¬(A25 → (¬(A22 → A23) → ¬A24)) → ¬A26).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the legislation has a review process then whenever it is not the case that an impact assessment implies the assessment is completed the assessment is not reviewed, it is not the case that the process under the legislation is completed.

(¬(A37 ∨ A38) → A39).natural: Whenever it is not the case that the legislation involves a state regulator or a federal regulator, a local exemption is permitted under the legislation.

(¬(A37 ∨ A38) → A40).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the legislation involves a state regulator or a federal regulator, a national standard is established by the legislation.

(¬(A37 ∨ A38) → ¬A39).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the legislation involves a state regulator or a federal regulator, a local exemption is not permitted under the legislation.

(¬(A46 → ¬A7) → A48).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the material undergoes chemical treatment it is not hazardous, then the material is exempt from treatment.

(¬(A46 → ¬A7) → A49).natural: Whenever it is not the case that chemical treatment implies the material is not hazardous, treatment is required for the material.

(¬(A46 → ¬A7) → ¬A48).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the material undergoes chemical treatment then it is not hazardous, it is not the case that the material is exempt from treatment.

(¬(A50 → (¬(A46 → ¬A7) → A49)) → A51).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if a treatment protocol is defined by the legislation then under the condition that it is not the case that chemical treatment implies the material is not hazardous treatment is required, a protocol violation occurs under the legislation.

(¬(A7 → A10) → A11).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the material is hazardous it is restricted, then the material is banned.

(¬(A7 → A10) → ¬A11).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the material is hazardous then it is restricted, it is not the case that the material is banned.

(¬A32 → A33).natural: Whenever it is not the case that recycling is mandated by the legislation, voluntary recycling is allowed under the legislation.

(¬A35 → A36).natural: Provided that it is not the case that a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, a disposal exception is allowed under the legislation.

(¬A35 → ¬A36).natural: If it is not the case that a disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation, it is not the case that a disposal exception is allowed under the legislation.

(¬A6 → A22).natural: Under the condition that the event is not approved, an impact assessment is conducted for the event.

(¬A6 → A7).natural: Whenever the event is not approved, the material is hazardous.

A15.natural: Compliance is required by the legislation.

A25.natural: The legislation has a review process.

A32.natural: Recycling is mandated by the legislation.

A35.natural: A disposal restriction is imposed by the legislation.

A50.natural: A treatment protocol is defined by the legislation.

A52.natural: A compliance audit is conducted under the legislation.

G.natural: The habitat is protected for the animal.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the animal is protected.

¬A18.natural: It is not the case that an exemption is granted under the legislation.

¬A22.natural: It is not the case that an impact assessment is conducted for the event.

¬A23.natural: It is not the case that the assessment for the event is completed.

¬A33.natural: It is not the case that voluntary recycling is allowed under the legislation.

¬A34.natural: It is not the case that a recycling incentive is offered under the legislation.

¬A41.natural: It is not the case that a uniform policy is adopted under the legislation.

¬A5.natural: It is not the case that the event is major.

¬A51.natural: It is not the case that a protocol violation occurs under the legislation.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that the material is hazardous.
